HeadComp.title: Voice API for your Business | Voice Call API | MSG91
HeadComp.description: Connect with customers using MSG91’s voice call APIs. Use virtual phone numbers and advanced voice features to build meaningful interactions.

BannerComp.heading: Boost customer engagement and build trust
BannerComp.subheading: Start real-time conversations with crystal clear audio, low latency and deeper insights.

features.name: Call Monitoring
features.content: Introducing the next-level communication experience with our all-new Call Monitoring featuresWe're putting you in the driver's seat of your conversations with callers. These robust features give you greater control and insight during your calls, ensuring enhanced communication and customer satisfaction. Call spying: your secret weapon for quality assurance! Call barging: real-time support, is just a click away! Call whispering: guidance at your fingertips!

features.name: Direct calling from browser
features.content: Skip the 2-way calling and directly call from browser.Save your agent calling time and enhance customer experience. Easily connect two phone numbers without keeping one on hold to start a customer conversation.

features.name: IVR Flow
features.content: Modern IVR that makes customer interaction quick and hassle-free.Smart IVR system that offers more that just resolving queries. Besides the usual, you can create a time-based or agent-based setting and even record a message.

features.name: Bulk Voice
features.content: Speak directly with your audience over a single call.Record your voice message and blast the message you wish to convey to hundreds and thousands of customer in one go. A ringing phone call is usually hard to ignore.

features.name: Multiple Way to Upload File
features.content: Upload your audio message in multiple ways.Amplify your customer interaction with personalised voice message. Record your message for bulk voice call or IVR menu through text-to-speech, browser mic or phone call.

features.name: Bulk voice with IVR
features.content: Connect your voice call to the IVR.Not just send a bulk voice message but also get a response from your users. Record the message you’d like to convey and send it to your customers using an IVR.

features.name: Real time connect with agent on user input on bulk call
features.content: Direct your user to your support agentsUp the customer experience game by offering real-time support when you connect your users to your customer support agents based on their bulk call input.

PreFooterComp.content: Start building your ideal customer engagement experience
